name: Arsenal Kit
dis: • Arsenal home jersey for the 2002/03 and 2003/04 seasons, designed by Nike. • The design for this jersey consists predominantly of red color, with white sleeves and other minor details in the same color appearing on different parts of it. The club won the Premier League during the 2003/04 season without suffering a single defeat using this kit.

name: Manchester Utd Kit
dis: • Manchester United 2004/05 Home Jersey designed by nike • The design for this unique jersey consists predominantly of red color, with a black V-shape appearing on the top front part of the jersey.
